phone.shortDescription: Packed with essentials, the Samsung Galaxy J3 (2016) has all you need to do everything you want. Connect with friends and surf the web on a vibrant, 5-inch HD display. Listen, watch and game - on the go - with expandable memory up to 128GB. And get to everything quickly with Easy Mode.

A powerful phone that stands out from the rest. The LG Volt 2's innovative, ergonomic design is stylish with an easy, comfortable grip. And its large, 5.0-inch HD touchscreen and ultrafast processor combine for an unmatched browsing experience.

Introducing the new Apple® iPhone® 6s. The only thing that's changed is everything. A breakthrough design. Pushed even further. With just a single press, 3D Touch lets you do more than ever. Live Photos brings your memories to life in a powerfully vivid way. And that's just the beginning.

[iPhone 6 Plus isn't just bigger-it's better in every way. A 5.5-inch Retina HD display. An A8 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture. A new 8MP iSight camera with Focus Pixels and optical image stabilization. The Touch ID fingerprint identity sensor. Faster LTE and Wi-Fi.<sup>1</sup> Longer battery life.<sup>2</sup> And iOS 8 and iCloud. All in a 7.1mm thin seamless design.

Introducing the new Apple® iPhone® 6s. The only thing that's changed is everything. A breakthrough design. Pushed even further. With just a single press, 3D Touch lets you do more than ever. Live Photos brings your memories to life in a powerfully vivid way. And that's just the beginning.

A stunning, innovative smartphone, the Samsung Galaxy S® 5 features a bold 5.1" HD display, 16MP camera, S Health™ and heart rate monitor so you can keep track of your life right down to your heartbeat. The next big thing just got better.

Serious Android™ performance at an affordable price. The LG G Stylo features an enormous 5.7-inch HD touchscreen with an embedded stylus for extra easy navigation. And its 8MP rear-facing camera delivers great-looking pictures and videos. Work or play, the LG G Stylo lets you get it done in style.

All the smartphone essentials for a price that’s hard to believe. The Huawei Union comes with Android™ 5.1, a bright 4.5-inch touchscreen and a fast 1.1 GHz quad-core processor. Watch videos, share pics and surf the web with the blazing speed of 4G LTE.

Powerful and affordable, the new Moto G is a smartphone you can count on. It's durable and water-resistant, so it won't let you down. And with innovative software, a 13MP camera and the speed of 4G LTE, it's ready for anything.

The new HTC Desire 626s has a brilliant 5 inch HD display, quad-core processor, dual megapixel cameras, powerful customization options with HTC BlinkFeed® and HTC Sense® 7 - all available with an unlimited, prepaid, no contract plan from Virgin Mobile.

Double down on must-have features and incredible value with the LG Tribute 2™. This ultra slim smartphone is powered by Android™ 5.1 and features a vibrant 4.5-inch touchscreen, 5MP camera and speedy 1.2GHz processor. Loaded with all of that, plus a sleek, modern design, it's available at a price that's hard to believe.
The Lumia 635 4G LTE Windows 8.1 Smartphone is available from Virgin Mobile. Get a no contract plan with unlimited data and messaging.
The new ALCATEL Elevate smartphone offered by Virgin Mobile, with 4.5 inch display, 5MP camera, Android 5.1 Lollipop, and 1.1 GHz quad core processor.

Be pool ready with the Kyocera Hydro Vibe 4G LTE. Featuring waterproof capabilities, a 4.5" impact-resistant display and Smart Sonic receiver technology, accidents and loud environments are no longer an issue.
The HTC Desire® 510 4G LTE Android Smartphone is available from Virgin Mobile. Get a no contract plan with unlimited data and messaging.
Featuring a 3.5" touchscreen, Android 4.0, 1GHz processor and 3.2MP camera, the Kyocera Event is a big deal for a small price.

Your phone and music player on the go, the ALCATEL ONETOUCH Speakeasy™ is your go-to device at a low price. With a 2.4" display featuring external caller ID, Bluetooth 3.0 and support for Micro SD cards, you should never be without a song to get you through the day.

The LG Tribute™ 4G LTE delivers the blazing-fast speed of 4G LTE at a price you will love. Enjoy running multiple apps at once, quickly and efficiently with the 1.2 GHz Quad-Core processor. The 5.0MP camera comes with Touch & Shoot so you can snap and share like a pro. The LG Tribute™ 4G LTE delivers a pretty nice bang for the buck!
It's a texty beast! Everything's at your fingertips: a slide-out QWERTY keyboard, 3.5" touch display and 3.2MP Camera, LED Flash and Video Capture, plus Google Play™ for all the latest apps.

You don't have to pay for more than you need with this affordable camera flip phone. Equipped with a 2.0MP camera, large screen and tactile keypad for faster, easier typing, the Kyocera Kona is the go-to phone for your talk, text and picture messaging needs.

planType.title: payLo Talk & Text Plans
planType.shortDescription: Available on PayLo Talk & Text plans.
planType.longDescription: Available on PayLo Talk & Text plans.

phone.shortDescription: iPhone 6 isn't just bigger-it's better in every way. A 4.7-inch Retina HD display. An A8 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture. A new 8MP iSight camera with Focus Pixels. The Touch ID fingerprint identity sensor. Faster LTE and Wi-Fi.<sup>1</sup> Longer battery life.<sup>2</sup> And iOS 8 and iCloud. All in a 6.9mm thin seamless design.
